Good retro football (or soccer) game, the control is simple but hard to master, and the gameplay is fast paced and could be hectic sometimes. Nice reminiscent of old football game in NES or SNES console. And the best thing about this game is no ads and no microtransaction. Kudos to the developer!

The game plays great :D controls are surprisingly simple, but doesn't affect how you play (strategically or casually)!! I do have to say though, the game is going to be best for you if you actually enjoy soccer games, otherwise you might enjoy it for a short time then put it down. I did find a bug where I had no sound when using a power bank and earphones, but I could hear sound through my speakers. I would also like to request longer than 10 minute games, even full 90 minute games would be cool :D
lots of action and fun. I couldn't stop playing!

The game was just fine in its earlier stages but it's starting to run really slow on my phone. Very awesome game and would rate 5 stars if it weren't for the lag issue. Issue has been fixed, thank you

content: I only got to play the game once now it just loads and turns off would be five of that didn't happen
replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear that. We will try to reproduce this error and get back to you asap. Thanks.

content: The actual game is pretty darn good. Very smooth and entertaining. Only annoyance is the very long loading time. It took so long my screen turned off. But only initially.  Definitely one of the best soccer games on the Play Store otherwise. Pure arcade fun.  Edit: Game was recently updated, but the loading time is still very long. Still, the actual game is pretty darn great!
replyContent: Hi Jacob, did the version 1.0.2 solved your long loading time issue? We are sorry for the inconveniences and we will be grateful if you let us know if this problem was fixed.

content: Fantastic riff on classic 90's arcade soccer games. Love the look, feel and sound of the game, which are pitch perfect! (excuse the pun!) I was going to dock a star as it doesn't seem to have Google Play Games integration yet (the iOS version has tons of achievements) but I've added it back on for the sheer amount of content in the game (no IAP's!!) plus how great the devs were in getting the game fixed and working and responding to problems! üëç
replyContent: Hi Jon, good to know that update 1.0.2 solved the problem. And many thanks for your new review and feedback! We will continue improving the game.

content: I'm quite jealous of my brother that he could get the game for free on his apple device but tbh I really don't mind paying 3 euros because it is worth it! Keep up the great work!
replyContent: Way to go! Thanks for supporting the developers!

content: Works great on Nexus 6p!! Running very smooth and super fun game.
The game is so much fun and honestly the best soccer game on Play Store.

THE perfect mobile football game!

I love this game! It kind of feels like Super Mario Strikers in a way, and I'm very nostalgic towards that game. I have it on my iPad and I had to get it on my phone. I hope to get it on my PC very soon!
replyContent: Hi, Pixel Cup Soccer 17 is already available on Steam as an Early Access game ;) Thanks for your feedback!
